name: Asagi Mutsuki | 浅黄ムツキ (Blue Archive)
description:
Asagi Mutsuki | 浅黄ムツキ (Blue Archive)

Cute brat.

Need to use a stronger weight for her white kimono prompt since it won't show up as it's supposed to be and I don't want to overfit it with higher unet lr, but do try playing around with various weights for it on different models you use. Samples tested at 1 strength on Anything v4.5.

Use all or some of these tags to get Mutsuki:

  • Mutsuki School Uniform:

    • mutsuki

    • halo, side ponytail, long hair, white hair, hair ornament, purple eyes, black jacket, short sleeves, frills, frilled skirt, red skirt, plaid skirt, thigh strap

  • Mutsuki New Year:

    • nymutsuki

    • halo, hair bun, hair flower, white hair, purple eyes, (white kimono:1.4), long sleeves, wide sleeves, fur collar

Have fun!
